comments:
1. Check out org.eclipse.ui.workbench from HEAD.
2. Observe how there is a warning on the .project file.
3.  In the Problems view, select the marker corresponding to warning in 2.
4. Bring up the Quickfix wizard.
5. Press Finish.

The wizard stays up and cannot be dismissed.

Following exception in log:
